org.janusproject.acl.protocol

Class AbstractFipaProtocol

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.janusproject.acl.protocol.AbstractFipaProtocol
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FipaContractNetProtocol, FipaProposeProtocol, FipaRequestProtocol

    public abstract class AbstractFipaProtocol
extends java.lang.Object
    This abstract class describes all the necessary information common to every protocols.
    Version:
    $FullVersion$
    Author:
    $Author: madeline$, $Author: kleroy$, $Author: ptalagrand$, $Author: ngaud$

      • hasReachedTimeout

        public boolean hasReachedTimeout()
        Tests if timeout has been reached.

        If this method is called whereas getStartedTime() hasn't been set, getStartedTime() will be automatically set to the current time.

        Returns:
        true the timeout has ellapsed, false otherwise
